mapper.insert: insert into fsx (tid, uid, year, averagescore, advancebatch, firstbatch, secondbatch, thirdbatch) values (#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{averagescore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advancebatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update fsx set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, averagescore = #{averagescore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, advancebatch = #{advancebatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, firstbatch = #{firstbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, secondbatch = #{secondbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thirdbatch = #{thirdbatch,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tid, uid, year, averagescore, advancebatch, firstbatch, secondbatch, thirdbatch from fsx
